UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of Protegrin-1 Analogs with Improved Antibacterial Selectivity.
Literature.Author: Bolosov IA, Panteleev PV, Sychev SV, Khokhlova VA, Safronova VN, Toropygin IY, Kombarova TI, Korobova OV, Pereskokova ES, Borzilov AI, Ovchinnikova TV, Balandin SV

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:47.8±11.96% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=4.3 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:92% Cytotoxicity=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.5µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=0.125µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=0.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=0.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=0.125µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1µM),Micrococcus luteus B-1314(MIC=0.5µM)
